courses.name: Certificate IV in Kitchen Management + Advanced Diploma of Hospitality Management
courses.note: These qualifications require service periods. Please visit the individual course outlines on our website.National Polytechnic of Australia qualifications only fulfil the academic requirement, not a licensed trade qualification, traineeship or apprenticeship.
